datasets.title: EDC Dataset
datasets.description: Contains clinical visit records detailing subject dosing information and any reported adverse events.

datasets.title: ePRO Dataset
datasets.description: Captures self-reported symptoms and their severity from subjects over time.

datasets.title: IVRS Dataset
datasets.description: Records subject randomization details, including assigned drug kits, countries, and dose groups.

edc_df.subject_id: A unique identifier assigned to each participant in the study.

edc_df.visit_date: The date on which the subject visited the clinical site or data was recorded.

edc_df.dose_mg: The amount of drug administered to the subject, measured in milligrams.

edc_df.adverse_event: Any undesirable experience or medical occurrence reported by the subject during the study.

epro_df.subject_id: A unique identifier for the subject reporting symptoms (used to match with other datasets).

epro_df.symptom: The type or name of the symptom reported by the subject (e.g., headache, nausea).

epro_df.severity: The intensity level of the reported symptom, often on a predefined scale (e.g., mild, moderate, severe).

epro_df.report_date: The date when the symptom was reported by the subject.

ivrs_df.subject_id: A unique identifier assigned to each participant in the trial (used to match with other datasets).

ivrs_df.randomization_date: The date on which the subject was randomly assigned to a treatment group.

ivrs_df.drug_kit: Identifier for the specific drug kit assigned to the subject.

ivrs_df.country: The country in which the subject is participating in the clinical trial.

ivrs_df.dose_group: The predefined dosing group or treatment arm to which the subject was assigned (e.g., low dose, high dose).

lab_df.subject_id: Unique identifier for each patient or subject.

lab_df.test_name: Name of the lab test performed (e.g., WBC, Hemoglobin).

lab_df.value: Result of the lab test (numeric value).

lab_df.unit: Measurement unit for the lab test result (e.g., mg/L, g/dL).

lab_df.lab_date: Date when the lab test was conducted.
